pullrequest.title: Improved PulseBlaster add_device and removed extraneous DDS/DigitalOut check

content.raw:
Declining this Pull Request. The point of the code removed was to inform the user that they are using the old style device hierarchy and should swap to the new style or that they don't need to instantiate a PseudoClock themselves for the PulseBlaster because it is already done for them. It isn't strictly necessary code, but I think it is important to have informative error messages when changing the Public API.

Apologies for the long delay in responding to this, but I wasn't set up to get email notifications for this repo.
